details.overview: A multinational technology company that offers a wide range of products and services, including search, email, maps, and productivity tools.
details.mission: Organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
details.culture: Informal and collaborative, encouraging creativity and innovation.
details.corperatePriorities: Make the world's information accessible and useful, build products that people love, create more opportunities for everyone, be a force for good in the world.
